description.value:
Prerequisite: 21st level, Wis 13 or trained in Perception

Benefit: Creatures adjacent to you gain no benefit from concealment or total concealment against you, and invisible creatures adjacent to you are effectively visible to you.

Revision (7/28/2008)

Replace Benefits text with "Creatures adjacent to you gain no benefit from concealment or total concealment against you, and invisible creatures adjacent to you are effectively visible to you."

Published in Player's Handbook, page(s) 206.
